name: Skateboard Park Tycoon 2004: Back in the USA
name_original: Skateboard Park Tycoon 2004: Back in the USA
description:
Skateboard Park Tycoon 2004: Back in the USA is a strategy-sports game developed by Cat Daddy Games. It was originally released in 2003. Activision Value Publishing published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Skateboard Park Tycoon 2004: Back in the USA is available on PC.
